title: Farmer Medium Dark Skin Tone
description: A person with a medium-dark skin tone working as a farmer, often depicted with a straw hat and holding a pitchfork or surrounded by crops. Represents agricultural work, rural life, and dedication to the land.
apple_vendor_description: The farmer emoji on Apple devices presents a diligent individual with a medium-dark skin tone, distinguished by a warm, friendly smile and a straw hat casting a subtle shadow. Apple’s signature glossy 3D shading enhances the texture of their simple, practical clothing, creating a realistic and approachable portrayal. This emoji is a heartfelt symbol of hard work, agriculture, and connection to the land, often used when discussing food sources or outdoor endeavors.
